articles.author: PTI
articles.title: India's not playing structural hockey: Pak coach Saqlain - Rediff.com
articles.description: Pakistan head coach Muhammad Saqlain on Tuesday said India are not playing 'structural hockey' as the two arch rivals prepared for their clash in the ongoing Asian Champions Trophy hockey.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Pakistan coach Muhammad Saqlain believes his young side will have their task cut out when they take on hosts India in Chennai on Wednesday. Photograph: Hockey India
